TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleTimeSpan extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable
Public Structure OracleTimeSpan Implements IComparable, INullable
public value class OracleTimeSpan : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable

summary.span: 表示時間間隔並對應至 Oracle 9i 資料型別。

span.span: Represents a time interval and corresponds to the Oracle 9i data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Oracle`INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND`資料型別 (Oracle 9i 或更新版本) 包含一段時間，以天、 小時、 分鐘和秒為單位，且有 11 個位元組的固定的大小。The Oracle `INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND` data type (Oracle 9i or later) contains an interval of time in days, hours, minutes, and seconds, and has a fixed size of 11 bytes. 若要取得物件，呼叫方法。To obtain an object, call the method.

summary.span: 表示 結構的最大有效日期值。

span.span: Represents the maximum valid date value for an structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值為 10675199.02:48:05.4775807。The value is 10675199.02:48:05.4775807. 若要取得的值大於，使用 Oracle 選取時，發生 TO_CHAR 陳述式。To obtain a value greater than , use the Oracle SELECT TO_CHAR statement. 如需有關支援的 Oracle 9i 的範圍`INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND`資料類型，請參閱 Oracle 文件。For more information about the ranges supported by the Oracle 9i `INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND` data type, see your Oracle documentation.

span.span: Represents the minimum valid date value for an structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為-10675199.02:48:05.4775808。The value is -10675199.02:48:05.4775808. 若要取得的值小於，使用 Oracle 選取時，發生 TO_CHAR 陳述式。To obtain a value less than , use the Oracle SELECT TO_CHAR statement. 如需有關支援的 Oracle 9i 的範圍`INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND`資料類型，請參閱 Oracle 文件。For more information about the ranges supported by the Oracle 9i `INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND` data type, see your Oracle documentation.
